channel.title: Reproducible Reseatch on English

item.title: Reproducibility
item.description: How do I got there? Did you ever re-run an old script and have errors due to you have updated a package? Do you want to get a graphic again but you forgot the format and size you used the first time? Have you ever forgotten the name and location of the file where your database is stored? Have you ever said, “I spent hours trying to run my code and then I realized that the error was very simple”?
